{{project|Interactive tools and calculators}}

The lists below contain interactive tools and '''calculators''' hosted on the wiki and some external calculators on [[w:Desmos|Desmos]].

You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser for them to work. Calculators and interactive tools may not work with outdated (released more than 2-3 years ago) browser versions or browsers with little or no JavaScript support.

Feedback and suggestions about these tools may be left on the [[Talk:Calculators|talk page]], the wiki's [https://github.com/mc-wiki/mcw-calc GitHub repository] or the [https://discord.gg/fGdE5ZE Discord server].
